name: redux-saga
description: Saga middleware for Redux to handle Side Effects

scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-saga.js
scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-saga.min.js
scripts.real-world: npm --prefix examples/real-world install examples/real-world && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs node --require babel-register examples/real-world/server.js
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g redux-saga/redux-saga
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:redux-saga/redux-saga gh-pages --force
scripts.prerelease: npm run check && npm run prepare
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Yassine ELOUAFI <yelouafi@gmail.com>
